text: avaraṟiññiṭṭillē? avarkkumump etra talamuṟakaḷeyāṇ nāṁ naśippiccat. niṅṅaḷkku nāṁ ceytutanniṭṭillātta sekaryaṁ bhūmiyil nāmavarkk ceytukeāṭuttirunnu. avarkku nāṁ mānattuninn dhārāḷamāyi maḻa varṣiccu. avaruṭe tāḻbhāgattūṭe puḻakaḷeāḻukkukayuṁ ceytu. pinne avaruṭe pāpaṅṅaḷuṭe phalamāyi nāmavare naśippiccu. avarkkupiṟake maṟṟu talamuṟakaḷe vaḷarttikkeāṇṭuvarikayuṁ ceytu
